name: Specification Execution Workflow
description: Execute tasks from a specification systematically with phase-gating and validation. Parses tasks.md from a spec directory, extracts phases dynamically, and guides systematic implementation with checkpoint validation at each phase.
author: Agent OS Team

phases.purpose: Parse specification structure, extract phases and tasks, validate completeness, and build execution plan
validation_criteria: Required spec files present (tasks.md, specs.md, implementation.md)

tasks.name: Locate and Validate Spec
tasks.purpose: Find spec directory, validate structure, check required files

tasks.name: Parse Tasks File
tasks.purpose: Extract phases, tasks, dependencies, and validation gates from tasks.md

tasks.name: Build Execution Plan
tasks.purpose: Create execution plan, query standards, prepare for implementation

phases.purpose: Execute tasks for each phase defined in tasks.md, following spec design and implementation guidance

task_execution.description: Use get_task(session_id, phase, task_number) to retrieve one task at a time, execute it completely with full production quality, then move to next task

core_utilities.name: Task Parser
core_utilities.purpose: Parse tasks.md structure, extract phases, tasks, dependencies, and validation gates

core_utilities.name: Dependency Resolver
core_utilities.purpose: Validate and resolve task dependencies, determine execution order

core_utilities.name: Validation Gates
core_utilities.purpose: Extract and validate checkpoint criteria from tasks.md

when_to_use: Need tracked progress with state persistence
Working on complex features with multiple phases
Need audit trail of implementation decisions

code_quality: Comprehensive Sphinx-style docstrings for all code
Full type hints (parameters and return types)
Error handling with specific exception types
testing: Unit tests for all new functions/classes
All tests passing before phase completion
documentation: Inline code comments for complex logic

workflow_features.state_tracking: Full workflow state persisted via workflow engine
workflow_features.resumability: Resume from last completed checkpoint after interruption
workflow_features.horizontal_scaling: One task at a time via get_task() for focused execution
workflow_features.standards_integration: Automatic querying of relevant standards via MCP
workflow_features.audit_trail: Complete record of tasks completed, evidence collected, decisions made

notes: This workflow dynamically adapts to the spec structure
Phase count and tasks determined by parsing tasks.md
Validation gates extracted from tasks.md ensure quality
Use get_task() for horizontal scaling (one task at a time)
Can nest other workflows (e.g., test_generation_v3) within tasks
